website_summaries.verdict: A good value if you are looking for a spacious container for your pet food.
pros: A basic, rugged storage bin available in various sizes – capable of holding up to 50 pounds of food
Features BPA-free materials with wheels for easy maneuverability
cons: Though owners report being happy with the sturdy build of the container, several found that the lid doesn't provide an airtight seal
Lid latch and hinge seem a bit flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but larger than I needed
customer_reviews.text: Good container that I use to store one of those 50-lb. bags of rice from Costco. As you can see from the photos the container is about twice as large in volume than I needed. I guess it depends on the volume of what you're storing.
customer_reviews.author: NumberOneSon

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Holds 50lbs of dry dog food and a scooper and a couple of small bowls. Arrived right on time in perfect condition. Wheels were packed inside and attach easy. Looks like it should keep the dog food fresh. It has an inner seal around the lid and a the latch will keep it closed.
customer_reviews.author: Christy C

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size! I would not consider this the most airtight container but it works for what I wanted it for which was to have a more practical container for my dogs food. I was tired of having her big dog food bag just laying around. The wheels are an awesome plus, especially because her dog food bag is fairly large. My only true complaint is the lingering weird plasticy smell that still hasn’t gone away even after a couple of months and cleaning it with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Needed a big bin to hold dog food, got a big bin to hold dog food
customer_reviews.text: With a large dog and 40 pound bags of dog food we needed a bin that was easy to load/unload and move around the kitchen. This did the trick with the caster wheels (also removable) and plenty of space to hold a full bag of food plus some. There is a gasket and it seems to keep the food fresh enough - dog doesn't complain. Also no bugs or ants (which was a previous problem with the open bag we had) so that's working for us too.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Rake

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these containers. I purchased two of these because my dogs eat different dog food and I wanted to be able to keep their food separate while maintaining the freshness of the dog food. The wheels fit well and enable the containers to be moved easily. The containers are large enough to comfortably hold the almost 32 lb. bags that I bought so I don't need to worry about storing left over dog food anywhere else. The lids fit securely and latch, which keeps the dogs from nudging them open and helping themselves. The lids are hinged, so they can be opened completely without falling off. Very good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Graceful One

customer_reviews.title: Used These Containers for Years!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back, so everything I have is on wheels. This item will last indoors for about 5 to 7 years and outdoors for about 5 years. While the container itself stays intact, the wheels do deteriorate and I couldn't find new wheels to replace them with. The wheels are sturdy enough to push around 55lbs of dog food when moving it to clean behind it. I use the outdoor container for my recyclables and the one inside for dog food storage. So far so signs of pests and the food always seem fresh and crisp. I definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was great
customer_reviews.text: We loved this at first. But a few weeks ago I noticed the plastic holding the right hinge was missing. I started checking closer and found part of it had broken off and who knows where it went. The piece that was left was very sharp. So we have been scared to death that our puppy swallowed it, but if she did she must have passed it ok but this is a horrible safety problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids who don't put lids back on!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced my dogs old storage contain with this one and it has been a god send. The kids would never put the lid back on correctly when they fed the dog. This one goes right back into place with a snap, keeping the dogs food fresh and critters away. It also take up less space in the closet so we have more available storage. It also stores my dogs +40 lbs bag of dog food with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in undamaged outer box. Inside, the plastic latched areas where the hinges are , one was broken and the piece was in bottom of shipping container. Also the black tabs on the lid barely and I mean barely go past the edge of the hinge to hold in place. Not happy. Also they are not sending replacement for another 3 weeks. It took 19 days from receipt of order initially. Replacement should be sent immediately based on it being defective and unusable. Update: New one arriving Friday! Perfect thank you. 5/5/20
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Securo

customer_reviews.title: A NECESSARY PRODUCT FOR MY NEEDS!
customer_reviews.text: This was a reorder. I have nearly a dozen of these and use them for a variety of storage uses, such as keeping dry dog or cat food. I also have them filled with enriched, packaged garden soil/plant starter and other products. I especially like the fact that I can see what is in each container without having to open the lid, and being on wheels makes them easy to use and maneuver. I'm a long-time fan of these IRIS rolling storage units. D.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Decent container, but the wheels leave something to be desired...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold 40 lb. bags of dog food, and it does that job well. However, when moving it around on anything but perfectly smooth flat floors, the wheels get hung up. If you try to lift the thing over an obstacle, one of the wheels inevitably falls out, creating an annoying situation. So if you're just buying it to store dog food and the like, go for it. If your purchase depends on the mobility and quality of the wheels, you might consider looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: ZacTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Rice Storage
customer_reviews.text: I got a 50lb rice sack and wanted to store it in a container. I was skeptical of the wheels handling the weight but after receiving this a few days ago and putting all the 50lbs of rice inside it I have no fear of the wheels breaking. The build is very sturdy and the container is fairly air tight.
customer_reviews.author: Herman N Soriano

customer_reviews.title: Cheap thin plastic
customer_reviews.text: We are working on the second one of these. The first one arrived shattered, it was replaced. The second one arrived intact but opening it up the "hinge" area cracked a bit. It stays shut and moves easily enough. But had I known how cheaply made it was, I wouldn't have bought it. It stays in a corner away from everything as I'm afraid if something bumps it to hard it is going to shatter the plastic. It does the job for now, but will be replacing it soon for a more durable one.
customer_reviews.author: ReadingMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't mind putting the wheels back on
customer_reviews.text: I give this 4 stars. I've had 2 of these for over a year, and they keep the food contained well. I keep them out in the laundry room and have not had any quality concerns over the food. My ONLY complaint is that the wheels don't really stay in the holes (there's no snap-in/locking mechanism) so when I refill it with a 34lbs bag of food, sometimes one or two of the wheels will come off. There haven't been any disasters (yet) but I can see this causing issues for people. If the wheels stayed in place, I'd give this 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Y.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these containers for my horses. One holds a full bag of Shredded Beet Pulp and the other holds nearly a full bag of Alfalfa Pellets. The lid on this one is a bit more flimsy than the other double stack Iris container I have for their supplements and cookies but it's serving it's purpose. I don't think ants are attracted to Beet Pulp or Alfalfa so I haven't had that problem and as long as my dogs can't get in them I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Of Unicorns

customer_reviews.title: Good container, bad construction
customer_reviews.text: Great container, keeps our dog food as airtight as it can be. My dogs haven't complained about the food being stale, so I assume it's working. The little casters (wheels) are cheesy, but nice. One problem is if you lift it, say to move over a transition in your flooring the wheels will just fall out the bottom, or maybe just one wheel will fall off and you set it back down and it tips over. Anyway some super glue will solve it, just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: TheDude

customer_reviews.title: Top Creates a Bowl of Water for Mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store charcoal outside, next to our Big Green Egg. It works great at keeping the charcoal dry... until you open the lid. Unfortunately, the lid is a REALLY poor design; it's concave AND has a recessed trench around the perimeter, so it collects a ton of water and it's very hard to get that water out of the trench. This is problematic for a few reasons; 1) even if you lean the container over before opening the lid, some water always still trickles into the previously dry inside area and 2) the pooling water is a constant breeding ground for mosquitoes, so I'm now tasked with remembering to tip it over after every rainfall.
customer_reviews.author: Reaxions

customer_reviews.title: Readily holds one of the 50# nyjer seed bags.
customer_reviews.text: Our goldfinch seem to like the Wagner's Nyjer seed sold here just fine. And this container handles one bag with a little spare. I've used other IRIS containers for pet food and was happy - and this one appears to do its job very well too. Recommended (unless you need to haul it around a lot - it is a bit lightweight for much hauling). I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: R.  Fryer

customer_reviews.title: great storage
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive it. My house is a total zoo. We have two dogs, a cat, cocktail birds, and batman chickens so we have bags of.animal food all over the house. Being able to organize the food in a container was so satisfying. It's pretty big and steady. The wheels make it so easy to move around. Now I have to buy 3 more to be able to organize all my pet food
customer_reviews.author: KARINA

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great size and true to the amount of dry dog food that can be stored in it. I would have given 4 stars, but one side where the wheel goes in has chipped, causing more of the area to break and now the wheel will not stay in. This was caused from moving it. I would suggest the manufacturer make larger/stronger wheels, or for those buying this to just leave it stationary.
customer_reviews.author: shinyshortness

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store pantry items like flour and sugar in. I swear we live on top of a giant ant colony and those little devils get into everything!!! So far this has been working well to keep them out of things! It has a nice gasket around the inside of the lid and a latch. The latch is pretty tight but I'm fine with that. It is just the right height for my pantry and rolls in and out of it very easily. I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cherilyn J. Bradock

customer_reviews.title: Not air tight
customer_reviews.text: Item is NOT air tight The latch doesn’t do much I can easily put my fingers between cover and container when “latched” Definitely won’t keep food air tight Too much of a pain in butt to put Masks on kids and drive someplace to return. Will use to store chicken feed But not dog food. Buyer beware. Not air tight.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf5

customer_reviews.title: SO WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: This container has been wonderful! I wish I would have bought one years ago. It holds at least 40 lbs of dog food, and maneuvers easily on the wheels. I can roll it out of the pantry when needed, and it's easy to get the food in and get it out. It is well worth it for the ease of use and convenience. So much better than trying to slide around a heavy, large plastic bin!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great food bin!
customer_reviews.text: We love this container. We had been wanting to get one for a while but hadn't made a decision yet. I found this one and went ahead and ordered it. Love the large size as we have 2 larger dogs who go through food pretty quickly. Even before we put the wheels on this was easy to slide across the tile in our kitchen. I'm thinking of buying a smaller one for our cat as well!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I keep my pet food in the closet beneath my stairs which is not very well lit. I wanted something that would easily roll out when needed and hold all the food. This is perfect!! I love the size and the lid folds completely back when open so you aren’t worried about breaking the hinges. I ordered both the 50lb and the 25lb and am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 50lbs of bread flour
customer_reviews.text: I love this storage container. I bake a lot of bread and got a great deal on a 50lb bag of premium bread flour but needed a storage container. This one is PERFECT! It has wheels and moves easily even when full. The lid closes tightly to keep the flour fresh and offers easy access to scoop it out. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: peasantmama

customer_reviews.title: flimsy plastic, not airtight
customer_reviews.text: really disappointed, had hoped to store large bags of flour in these- i bought 3. but theyre flimsy, and lids dont close very well. the casters dont really roll. i dont even think theyd work to keep dogfood fresh. the chemical smell of plastic is overwhelming. im putting them out to the curb- maybe theyll be ok for garden waste!
customer_reviews.author: HLA

customer_reviews.title: Airtight?
customer_reviews.text: Seeing all the great reviews, I ordered this, believing that it was, indeed air tight. Well when it arrived, well packaged and clean, I was amazed at the cheapness of the lid and how it was already slightly warped inward. The flimsy clip, meant to hold the lid in place, couldn't have made anything air-tight if it was duct taped. Kinda bummed because we keep food storage and our last bin had given up the ghost after many years of usage. If this had been a great product, I would have bought many more.
customer_reviews.author: Weepingangel

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, works well for bird seed
customer_reviews.text: Got this because the squirrels found the bags of seed in the shed.... It seems like a steep price, but after comparing other bins and brands it turned out to be a fair price for what it was. One of the bins came with only 2 wheels in the packaging, Iris customer service delivered the new wheels within about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Good storage bin, squirrels hate it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing my bulk birdseed. Squirrels hate it... try to get in but can’t. That said, keep these in your garage or shed: varmints can eventually chew or scratch through the container (left my garage door opened one night...they didn’t get through but did leave a mess of plastic). Airtight means no moths either. I have 4 smaller bins from this company too, great product.
customer_reviews.author: mike h

customer_reviews.title: Annoying issue with wheels
customer_reviews.text: This container fits my needs as far as storing cat litter. It's maybe not airtight but it works fine for what I need it for. The one main issue which is a dealbreaker for me is the wheels keep falling off. I have a closet where the cat litter and litter box are kept and I have to keep getting on my hands and knees, lifting up a corner and trying to fit the wheel back in without getting the other wheels to fall off. It's very annoying. I would buy this again if I didn't need the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pomranky

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great price
customer_reviews.text: Such a great and well made product. Love the sturdy construction and the rollers are so very handy. It says it holds 50 pounds I think. I get 30 pound bags so this is great because I know have extra room in the container to refill it before I completely run out of dog food. The deal and closure seem like a really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Great for large amounts of food
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic purchase! I put a 50lb bag of food and it wasn’t overflowing or even near the top which is nice. The wheels on the bottom of high quality and have a 360 maneuverability. The one downside is the product came absolutely filthy on the outside. I had to wipe it down several times to get all of the grime off. Bright side is that there was nothing gross on the inside so that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: aburk

customer_reviews.title: Holds 50lbs of Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a 50 lb bag of dog food and after reading a few of the reviews about how they weren't able to fit that much in there I was worried. Not sure what kind of dog food they put in but the entire 50lbs fit. Of course you can't fit an entire bag if you have food left in there so it needs to be completely empty obviously. It glides across my floor with ease and seals well but isn't completely airtight but will keep ants and other small bugs out. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ash S.

customer_reviews.title: Plant stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love my garden and I love my dogs. This keeps my dirt, fertilizer and plant food inaccessible to my dogs but easily accessible to me. It also keeps bugs out of my potting soil. Even with those heavy bags it is easy to roll around my back room so I'm sure even with heavy dog food it would also roll well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to Store Flour, Rice, Sugar etc
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store 2, 25lb bags of flour in side by side. I just sliced the top open so I could roll the bags down when I was done. This container is awesome! Fits 2 bags very easily and it's secure. I highly recommend it for anyone who buys sugar, flour, rice or anything like that from Sam's/Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds food adequately but the latch is flawed
customer_reviews.text: This container serves the function for which it was purchased...it keeps open bags of dog food from cluttering my pantry. What it doesn't do is seal air tight because the plastic latch on the front has never functioned properly. The plastic tabs fit into their corresponding holes on the lid, but the fit is so loose that any amount of jiggling causes the latch to just fall off. I tried to get it to stay numerous times before I gave up. It still keeps my dogs from nose-diving into bags of food, but if the container was knocked on its side it would spill kibble everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Works great, holds a 36 pound bag of dog food
customer_reviews.text: I bought this container to hold dog food for our large dog (80 pound pit mix). One 36 pound bag of Purina ONE SmartBlend True Instinct Natural Adult dry dog food filled the container. I found that the wheels work really well even when the container is completely full. My kids are able to open and snap the lid closed easily.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer7993

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Dog-Daddy Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. You will too! Quality. Keeps the bugs and critters out. Rolls nicely. Holds 50lbs like it says. Nice seal keeps the smell to a minimum. Slept with it next to my bed (I travel in an small RV) for about a month and only smelled food at feeding time. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: David Bilyeu

customer_reviews.title: Runaway Wheels
customer_reviews.text: The containers themselves are decent enough. HOWEVER, the wheels fall off quite easily. I purchased a number of these only to have the wheels fall off within a short period of time, often time breaking the plastic around them, making them useless. They are what they are for the price but if you’re looking for durable, look for a different container and pay attention to the wheel construction. If you don’t mind not having wheels and keeping them stationary, they’re a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was shorter than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have three IRIS containers I use to store chicken food. They work great. Nice seals, sturdy, overall good products that I bought for around $15-18. I went to reorder, and they were like $55. So I ordered this one, with the black lid, for around $25. Overall it's just okay. It's shorter than the others I have, and the top and the handle are different. I liked the old style better with the blue lids. But, it will work for holding what I need.
customer_reviews.author: bb007p

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for storing cat food! Allows me to purchase bigger bags of food! It’s designed nicely with a clasp so the lid isn’t easily openable if you have dogs! Wheels works great too! I’ve been using this for about 6 months and it’s held up super well!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Ray

customer_reviews.title: love the container but it's not air tight or bugs proof.
customer_reviews.text: the container definitely help keeping bugs out most of the time but not as good as i would like. the sealing was are made out of a foam type material and so the bugs can get through it. And the lock also not as tight so it left enough space to exposed the sealing. this problem can be fix by replacing the foam type seal with a better rubber sealing. i will buy more just simply because of the size and price of this container.
customer_reviews.author: Hao Ta

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a month or two now and I really like it. It keeps my dogs food fresh and it easy to move around. Holds up to 50lbs of food.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa DePasqua

customer_reviews.title: Holds Costco dog food
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is this does not come with a hand scoop but you can get one from dollar tree. I get large bags of dog food from Costco and this container holds all the food. It seems to keep food fresh and be airtight. It rolls easily. Better on hard floor rather then carpet though. I’d say it’s worth the money to store your dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog food!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller IRIS food storage container for my boys when they were puppies. Now they are full grown and we buy a much larger bag of food for them. This rolls great. It easily holds the 45lb bag of food we buy and seals great. Well worth the money and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Crazysamie

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but..... the execution is horrible!
customer_reviews.text: While being a very nice container overall, there are 2 problems! Firstly it doesn't hold 50 pounds of Duck food ! Not the size, It won't hold the weight! causing the second problem... the wheels! They just snap into the base . Into a non reinforced area. The first time we tried to roll it (on a hard surface), 2 of the wheels just broke off at the base! Actually the base of the container broke. It still stores ok, but now it is not mobile (which was one of the reasons we bought it.)I am now trying to get an exchange (I won't try rolling the new one, for sure!)
customer_reviews.author: BikerEric

customer_reviews.title: LaGina
customer_reviews.text: So far this has worked out for us and making it easier to get food out for my dogs without making a mess. The only problem i am having is that the back wheels keep falling out. Not to happy about that since I have had surgery on my right hand numerous and is very weak.
customer_reviews.author: LaGina

customer_reviews.title: So much easier
customer_reviews.text: I store my 50 lb bag of birdseed in here. It is so easy to pull it out from under my cabinet, thanks to the wheels. and release the lidlock and scoop out as much seed as I need. Very easy to use and so far no bugs or mice have gotten in.
customer_reviews.author: LANTANARANCH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I needed at least a 14# container for the size bag of cat food I purchase, but that didn't exist in this brand. However, this works just fine for keeping food fresh and keeping my animals out of it. I just store the little bit that doesn't all fit at once in another small cereal container.
customer_reviews.author: Caylea

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR A Tub
customer_reviews.text: The one I had previously fell side-ways and the lid snapped and broke so needed a new one. I let this one fall side-ways and all and guess what ya'll?! It DIDN'T Brake, this thing is durable. My 300lbs pig Tubs will have a hard time getting into this one. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: daisy

customer_reviews.title: Broken hinges, missing wheels, strong chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I received a damaged product with missing wheels. The plastic that houses the lid’s hinges were broken and the plastic bits were at the bottom of the container. Poor quality. There was also a strong chemical smell from the container. I would not recommend this as a food storage container for humans or pets. Returned the same day received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but smells awful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. They are good and have a lot of space. The one thing I don’t like is the smell. They smell horrible and it affects the entire space it’s put in. It came in the timely manner and nothing was broken or damaged. I might be sending them back because I can’t stand the smell. I ordered them to store other dry foods nothing pet related.
customer_reviews.author: Mobeen Rana

customer_reviews.title: Latch fell off
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item 7/19/2020 for air tight dogfood storage. The handle latch which is necessary to securely close/lock the lid fell off 4 weeks after I started using it. It will not stay on, so there is no airtight seal. I tried to reach customer support however it goes to voicemail with a recording stating VM is full. I am unhappy with this item and customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: We got a puppy in may. He liked to chew open the bags of dog food. Our previous dogs never did this. So I decided we’ll get this container and see how that works from him destroying the bag. Holds a 40 lb bag nicely.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Rosselli

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty huge.
customer_reviews.text: It's WAY bigger than I thought. I kept looking at reviews and people were saying that this couldn't hold a 40 pound bag if cat litter. They were wrong. WAY WRONG! This thing can hold at least 4 of those bags! Which is awesome because now I only have to buy cat litter every few months! It rolls around really easy and my cats can't get into it! Definitely glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Rose

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect container for me
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect container for me. I buy the 40lb bags of Kirkland Dog food and only had a 10lb plastic container prior to purchasing this item. This tub easily holds the entire bag of food and then some which is great since I always buy another bag before running out. I absolutely love the wheels, so far they seem super durable even with 40+lbs of dog food in the container and they make it so easy to move the container around as needed when I'm cleaning my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to help keep our dog food fresh and so far this has worked perfectly! My 3 year old is even able to open it to feed the dog. We are practicing helping around the house and this definitely helps her being able to help out.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Williams

customer_reviews.title: Air tight,  great quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Price and quality are amazing fits 25lb bag of dog food perfectly. My 3 large dogs can not get into it. Keeps ants out. Durable, sturdy. Thinking about ordering one for my deck to house charcoal. One of my best purchases yet!
customer_reviews.author: crystal garhammer

customer_reviews.title: We use it for dog food storage works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Holds 48 lb of dog food. Me and my wife and my daughter love this great way to keep your food stored and don't have to worry about any rodents if they're in your house getting to it. Nice and dry dog food storage
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT ERICKSON

customer_reviews.title: Contains the smell, easy mobility!
customer_reviews.text: I loooooooove this rolling food container! I love that I can store it out of sight, and wheel it over to the food bowl when I need to feed my dog. I also love how it contains the smell too. That was the main reason I bought it, bc I could smell the dog food everywhere. So now, no more smell!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Ideal!
customer_reviews.text: This has a super seal and is just the right size for my application. There is zero air (or bugs) that can penetrate the seal. I keep this in my garage and use it as a temporary storage container for my compost. All the smell is contained inside, and there are no fumes coming out or bugs getting attracted to it. It's easy to carry when full and fits great while standing up inside the trunk of my car (although I chose not to install the wheels).
customer_reviews.author: Karen in Texas

customer_reviews.title: The casters break very easily
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this container four times now. They work really well but there is a huge downside. The casters break very easily either from the weight, an accident, or just rolling across the floor and you hit the threshold. My advice is to be careful and when you are moving it go slowly. For those complaining of the smell, wash it with vinegar and water and let it air out for two days.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Not as air right as I want it
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the the price point but I feel like it’s not the quality of air tight I’m looking for. Doesn’t lock on itself at all. Disappointed. Will use it for now but sucks because I need something better.
customer_reviews.author: Vanah

customer_reviews.title: Broke as soon as I opened it.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened it to get the wheels out, a piece broke off. It had to be already broken because I barely touched it. Extremely disappointed. I w or it's just that cheaply made. I was going to return it but i had already destroyed the box and I'm not going to waste any more money. Poor quality, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Texter

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots of dog food.
customer_reviews.text: Good storage container. I brought it for my dog food. Holds it great. Stays fresh. The only thing is I wish the wheels felt a little more sturdy when moving. Has this for a few weeks now and it's still going strong even with 50lbs of dog food in it.
customer_reviews.author: K JUDKINS

customer_reviews.title: Great product if survives shipping
customer_reviews.text: As others posted this tends to arrive busted. They put bubble wrap all around it marking a great effort to protect it. I had one broken hinge. My dog won’t tip it over so I didn’t want the hassle of returning it. Still seals with weight on top. Has a rubber gasket. Plastic corners are just fragile, the shipping companies should read the box and be careful with it when it says fragile! It is made to last if it survives shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Annonomous 2

customer_reviews.title: Airtight, keeps lots of food nice and fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Using this without the wheels as we just don't need them, but it is otherwise incredible. The latch on the lid makes a positive click when closed and the seal seems to work very well. I loaded it up with a 44lb bag of dog food the second week of February and it's now the third week of April and the food still seems fresh. This bin is kept in the pantry and there's never any smell of dog food in there. I would definitely recommend this for anyone who wants to store around a 44lb bag of food comfortably and conveniently.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a large bag of dog food
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to put the dog food in. It works great, seals shut, and glides nicely on the floor. The storage capacity is perfect for our 50lb bag of Pro Plan dog food. The container is more appealing to look at than just a big bag of food and helps keep the room looking more tidy.
customer_reviews.author: George Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Not very mobile without wheels
customer_reviews.text: Would have been super helpful had wheels actually been included. I need the container and I’m not going to move it that much so I will use it without the wheels but still, I paid for a wheeled unit.
customer_reviews.author: utahmomma

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great container for the price. Easy to open. I'm sure eventually the dog will figure it out, but it's perfect for the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: The entire container came all smashed up all the sides had massive holes in it. Can’t get a refund unless I mail it back. Well it’s covid19 and the ups store is 2 towns away and i cannot as a single mom justify taking my 5 year old son into public or a busy ups store. And I don’t have a printer to print my own shipping label. So I basically donated my money to this company. The product was literally in tiny plastic pieces when it arrived. Plastic material is so thin that picking it up could have cracked the sides easily. Thanks for taking my money.
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaBoom

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, kind of light weight
customer_reviews.text: I use this for flour storage, it can hold about 75lbs of flour. It’s good for the price, but the handle snapped off the second I used it and it hasn’t really stayed on well ever since. The wheels work decently and it moves well. Just wish the lid had a better seal.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: A baker's dream container for flour!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this thing. I use it for flour and I'm about to purchase 3 more for different types of flour. It's easy to maneuver, does a great job sealing in the flour and carries a 50lb bag of flour with ease. Highly recommended to any baker.
customer_reviews.author: Egglan

customer_reviews.title: Dog food bin
customer_reviews.text: For me it's too small in height. I have another one that is taller. I can't comment on the freshness since we have it a short time but it should be fine. In our giant dogs food doesn't last to long.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Bought two a couple of years ago and remain one of my best purchases to date
customer_reviews.text: I needed something big to store dry dog food in. These containers are the perfect thing. They're well built, durable, and open and close easily. I thought at first I'd leave the wheels off but they make the containers even more useful. I used to have them in a hall closet but now they slide away under a counter in my kitchen. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Daley

customer_reviews.title: Could not be more please with this
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. We go through dog food fast as in addition to our dog we foster boxers. Wanted something that held a very large bag of food and was also easy to move around so I can easily sweep the entire floor of my walkin pantry where this is kept. This fits the bill perfectly. Also the lid snaps and seals well which is important in Florida as our high humidity makes everything soggy quickly if not stored air tight
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Jent

customer_reviews.title: Love the size!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product, so I can’t rate all of it with stars yet. The first thing I noticed, of course, is a very strong smell of plastic, so hopefully, after a few days in the sun that will go away. The second thing I noticed right off the bat was there are only three wheels in the package instead of the four as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Lainie Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight or ant-proof.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to store pet food and keep ants out. If it were air-tight it would also be ant-proof. However less than 24 hours after putting cat food in the container it was swarming with ants. I'm heading to the dollar store now to buy multiple smaller containers that screw shut - because I know those are truly airtight and ant proof. I wish it worked, but it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m liking this container so far. It’s so much better than having my dogs bag food just out in the open. I feel like it’s kept fresher. I read the reviews about the container not being air tight. Which is true. But we kept the dog food in the bag & just put it in the entire thing in the container. For $22 it’s not gonna work miracles but I like the extra layer of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T.

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre air tight but otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: Th quality is ok. The air right seals were already a little dented when it arrived and the lid is flimsy unfortunately. It’s fine to hold a 35 pound bag of dog food which is what I wanted. I keep the food in the original packaging though inside the container because I don’t think the container would keep it fresh on it’s own.
customer_reviews.author: Dog mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality !
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to store bird seed! The wheels are really smooth and I love the seal around the inside of the lid that keeps it air tight. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Simple, Cheap Storage of Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I just needed something to store a 50 lb bag of dog food, it does fit that much, but it’s not air tight. It does have a plastic latch to prevent the dogs lifting it, but there’s no seal or anything to support the “airtight” part of the title to keep it fresh. It’s cheap, it comes with wheels to move it around, it does the job to constantly store food for my 3 dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Calk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Container for Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded by expectations. I bought it to hold the dog food that I buy in 35 lb bags. I has plenty of storage space for that purpose (about 60% full on a new bag). My 6 year old can pull it out of the closet across an area rug to the dog dishes and easily open and close the lid. The wheels work much better than I expected and the latch is easy to use. I highly recommend for a similar application.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Pet food or rice container
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep rice weevils out of our rice bag (I know it's pretty disgusting when you find them). They say to keep the rice in the closed container so they don't spread to other grain/flour in your pantry. Anyway we bought a 45lb bag from Costco and it fits perfectly in this bin. Love the wheels so I can easily move in and out of pantry.
customer_reviews.author: NWDad206

customer_reviews.title: Store pellets without the mess
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing pellets for our pellet stove. We scoop out pellets as needed, way less mess since saw dust stay way at the bottom of the container. Dumping full bag of pellets casue saw dust to fly everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Radi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold 50 lbs
customer_reviews.text: There is NO way this thing fits 50 lbs. I poured a 34 lb bag of dog food in it and it is almost full. I love the wheels and it's easy opening but the volume it holds is less than what I expected and thought I was purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia i. sitters

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect size for the 40lb size bag of dog food ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size for the 40lb size bag of dog food I just bought, can put the whole bag and all right in this container.,It is a nice quality for the price and wheels are basic and easy to just snap right in. It closes well so my dog cannot get into it at all, cannot even figure it out as she would if she could. I'd recommend if looking for something basic to hold your dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Dymek

customer_reviews.title: Huge, and great looking.
customer_reviews.text: This was MUCH larger than I was thinking. I ordered bigger so I could fit a large bag of dog food, but I was able to fit almost two! Happy I bought them, the totes I was using will be for power tools now.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!! Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these yesterday and I tried them out - works great for both dog and cat food! I didnt know if the little plastic castors would hold the weight of 50 pounds of food but they do. We have concrete flooring - so they roll very well. Love em with some aluminum scoops. Now I just need to label them and clean up the ole containers to be used for something else (Vittles Vault's). Got 2 more for Rice n Beans, Just ordered a few more for gardening materials!
customer_reviews.author: Tooker

customer_reviews.title: Lid Handle is flimsey, customer service is poor
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 days, the handle broke. It has two flimsy nubs that insert into the lid and one of them broke. I wrote to the company, asking for a new handle, never heard back from them.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Great container, holds closer to 40 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: Container is great, seems durable and wheels are of a good quality. The latch is simple. Only point of concern: This container claims to hold 50 lbs. We buy our dog's food in 40 lb bag. I emptied a brand new bag into this container, and there was little room left. I suppose different pet food brands and types are going to have a variety of sizes and weights. Just be mindful when pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Ernin

customer_reviews.title: This container is amazing! I always used to keep the dog food ...
customer_reviews.text: This container is amazing! I always used to keep the dog food bag in the garage, but I didn't like the idea of bugs getting in or my curious kids spilling the bag just because that's what kids do. This lid has a foam seal, so I like that. The wheels are great because 50 lbs of kibble can be tough to more around if you know what I mean!
customer_reviews.author: Andres A.

customer_reviews.title: Food bin
customer_reviews.text: I put a large 50 lb bag of dog food in it and by pushing the lid down, a piece of the plastic broke off in the back- that was my fault . I should have just poured the food out directly into the plastic bin then it would not have been a problem- other than that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is prefect for our pups food! Fits a whole large bag and still has room for more! Love that it is on wheels as it makes it easy to take out of closet to refill it. Would definitely purchase again if needed to!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Best online deal for a reliable food container
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not fully airtight, however, is perfect for storing our 33 lb. bags of Fromm Gold puppy food. Will surely keep rodents and ants away!!! The original puppy food bag goes straight into this container. I use a bag clip to reseal, keeping freshness last longer. Wheels are not the sturdiest but does the job for moving short distances in and out of our storage cabinet. For this price and usability, nothing comes close.
customer_reviews.author: Rott boy

customer_reviews.title: Arts & Crafts Container
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold my arts & crafts supplies. It holds a lot of them. And I can't wait to order a few more at the same price I paid. It really holds a lot. It's a blessing on wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Donna P. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pellets
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store 80lbs of wood pellets for my smoker and another one I use for wood pellets for cat litter! It perfect, more durable than I thought and easy to roll around on my porch when I need to!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany W.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase! I Had to reach out to customer service and they were prompt and very professional. Seen the same version in the pet store for way more money. Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great way to store your pets food
customer_reviews.text: I like the this holds 50 lb of dog food neatly. And the Pets can't into it. The food stays fresher . Plus it's a lot easier to get in and out of the food container when feeding our dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian p

product_meta.title: IRIS USA Nesting Airtight Pet Food Container, 50-Pounds MP-400
product_meta.description: The IRIS Nesting Airtight Pet Food Container is the perfect solution for all your pet food storage needs. The airtight seal and snap-tight latch lock in freshness and keep moisture, humidity, and pests out. Easily check the contents of this translucent container and its tapered shape makes it simple to scoop out pet food. Four sizes to choose from, to accommodate most popular bag sizes of dry dog food, cat food and bird seed. The two largest sizes include 4 free-wheeling casters for easy mobility. This airtight container is also great for storing wood chips, charcoal, and road salt. Made in the USA with BPA free material.
feature_bullets: Airtight seal and snap lock latch keep out moisture, humidity, and pests
Tapered container makes it easy to scoop out pet food
Holds up to 50 pounds dog food or 40 pounds cat food
Made in the USA with BPA-free material

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
